display.source:
#ifndef OPENACC
  magnify("");
  butterfly_geometry(delta_y, jmax, cx, cz,
    orientation_angle, Beamlines, tx,ty,tz,
    rC1_x,rC1_z,rC2_x,rC2_z,rC3_x,rC3_z, 
    rT1_x,rT1_z,rT2_x,rT2_z,rT3_x,rT3_z,
    r11, r12, r21, r22, focus_xw, focus_yh);
 #endif
